text:
Currently the images for the tabs Admin, Site, Authoring and Live are static
images. These should be generated using the i18n facilities so that these
strings can be translated.
creator: egli@apache.org
gregor@apache.org
text:
arguably, these should not be images at all, but just plain text with
appropriate CSS.
this is addressed as part of http://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=33024
creator: gregor@apache.org
